price: Bali wanasema kama walivyo sema watu wa kwanza.
arabic: بَلۡ قَالُواْ مِثۡلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ
footnotes: Hawakuzingatia hayo, bali waliwafuata wakanushaji walio kwisha tangulia, wakasema kama walivyo sema hao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: bal qālū mith'la mā qāla al-awalūna
